text: Neil Lyster (born 2 December 1947) is a road and track cyclist from New Zealand. He competed in two Olympic Games, 1968, 1972 and was team manager during one Olympic Games 1976. He competed in the 1978 Commonwealth Games, where he was the flagbearer at the opening ceremony, and won a silver in the 4000m Men's Team Pursuit. ==External links== * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1978 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for New Zealand Category:Olympic cyclists of New Zealand Category:Sportspeople from Wellington City Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in cycling
title: Neil Lyster
